title: Forms of representation of interpolation trigonometric splines
abstract:
Three forms of representation of trigonometric interpolation splines are
considered, in particular, the representation by the coefficients of the
interpolation trigonometric polynomial, the representation by trigonometric
B-splines, which are considered in more detail, and the representation by
fundamental trigonometric splines. The first and third forms of representation
are generalized to the case of non-periodic functions.
